ComicInfo.Title: The Silent Clown
ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
Terror comes to the small town of Russellville, Illinois! At a state fair, childhood friends Sean, Nikki and Lisa come face to face with the shape himself – Michael Myers! The body counts rise and the horror is taken to the next level in the second issue of this terrifying new series!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 07:25:35. [CVDB131758]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Lizzy John, Sean Phillips, Tim Seeley, Tim Seeley
ComicInfo.Inker: Lizzy John, Sean Phillips, Tim Seeley, Tim Seeley
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Lizzy John, Sean Phillips, Tim Seeley
ComicInfo.Characters: Judith Myers, Lisa Thomas, Michael Myers
